text: Liver disease is any disease affecting the liver. ==Types of liver disease== There are many forms of liver disease. Forms include: *Wilsons disease, a disease that causes both neurological dysfunction and liver disease. *Hepatitis, including hepatitis A, hepatitis B, and hepatitis C, the latter two of which cause chronic liver disease including Cirrhosis. *Primary biliary cirrhosis, a disease of unknown etiology *Hepatocellular carcinoma Category:Liver disease
title: Liver disease
